question.body: We are able to donate 1 pint (0.5 liters) of blood every 3 months. What fraction of our total blood is that?

response.feedback: Incorrect. It’s more than 1%; that’s why it takes 3 months to recover.
Correct. Blood donations show a clinical benefit for cardiovascular health of the donor.
Incorrect. This amount of blood loss would prevent re-normalization of homeostasis without replacement of fluids.
Incorrect. This amount of blood loss would lead to severe cardiovascular dysfunction.

part.hint: To find a percent, use this formula: (volume donated)/(total volume in the body)*100%.
Recall that we have 5 liters of blood in our body.
